did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Typewritten manuscript of a short story subsequently published in Ambit, no. 79 (1979). Included in a novel eventually published under title, White on black on white. Inscribed by the author to Douglas.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Typewritten manuscript of a short story subsequently published in Ambit, no. 79 (1979). Included in a novel eventually published under title, White on black on white. Inscribed by the author to Douglas.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: The snake's house (manuscript), #7640. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: Published version also in the Human Sexuality Collection.
